Title: Heartbeat
Plot: Mocking her friends' obsession with teen popstar Myles Kelly, Kat creates a video of her dancing to one of his songs and then posts it on the internet. The video becomes so popular she is contacted by his music company and invites her to dance in his next video clip. Meanwhile, Ethan views Christian as a friendly rival and the two boys begin to compete with each other.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
